players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I'm can't believe Alice is gone. We should all share any suspicions we have."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We need to vote him out today."
You: "I'm confirming that I killed Alice last night. Let's all focus on voting Bob out now."
Charlie: "Everyone, Bob's confession aligns with my investigation—he's the mafioso. Vote him out to save us!"
Diana: "I agree with Charlie—Bob's confession confirms he's the mafioso. Let's vote him out to end this."
